---
title: "Spotify IndieScore"
format: html
---

I created an app to get an IndieScore for a Spotify playlist based on how many monthly listeners each artist featured has. I developed it using FastAPI, Spotify Developer, HTML, CSS, Python, and host it on Render.com.

<script>
  // Detect the current Bootstrap theme and append as a query param to the iframe
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const theme = document.documentElement.getAttribute("data-bs-theme") || "light";
    const iframe = document.getElementById("indie-iframe");
    iframe.src = `https://spotify-indie-score.onrender.com/?theme=${theme}`;
  });
</script>

<iframe
  id="indie-iframe"
  width="100%"
  height="1400"
  style="border: none; border-radius: 12px;"
  loading="lazy"
  title="Spotify Indie Score App"
></iframe>
